timeline.bodyText: methods? this check is only about fields.
timeline.author: romani
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -95,6 +96,22 @@ protected boolean shouldCheckInScope(DetailAST modifiers) {
                 || applyToPrivate && isPrivate;
     }
 
+    /**
+     * Checks if given modifiers has public access.
+     * There are 2 cases - it is either has explicit modifier, or it is
+     * in annotation or interface.
+     *
+     * @param modifiers - modifiers to check
+     * @return true if public
+     */
+    private static boolean isPublic(DetailAST modifiers) {
+        return ScopeUtil.isInInterfaceBlock(modifiers)
+                // interface methods can be private

replies.bodyText: This method is common for several checks, including MethodNameCheck. I added test case, report and PR title shows that this one is also fixed.
replies.author: strkkk

timeline.bodyText:
please make it like
                    modifiers.findFirstToken(TokenTypes.LITERAL_PUBLIC) != null;
                     || ScopeUtil.isInAnnotationBlock(modifiers)
                     || ScopeUtil.isInInterfaceBlock(modifiers)
                       // interface methods can be private
                     && modifiers.findFirstToken(TokenTypes.LITERAL_PRIVATE) == null

it will be easier to read.
timeline.author: romani
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -95,6 +96,22 @@ protected boolean shouldCheckInScope(DetailAST modifiers) {
                 || applyToPrivate && isPrivate;
     }
 
+    /**
+     * Checks if given modifiers has public access.
+     * There are 2 cases - it is either has explicit modifier, or it is
+     * in annotation or interface.
+     *
+     * @param modifiers - modifiers to check
+     * @return true if public
+     */
+    private static boolean isPublic(DetailAST modifiers) {
+        return ScopeUtil.isInInterfaceBlock(modifiers)
+                // interface methods can be private
+                && modifiers.findFirstToken(TokenTypes.LITERAL_PRIVATE) == null
+                    || ScopeUtil.isInAnnotationBlock(modifiers)
+                    || modifiers.findFirstToken(TokenTypes.LITERAL_PUBLIC) != null;

timeline.bodyText:
final boolean isStaticFinal = 
            modifiersAST.findFirstToken(TokenTypes.LITERAL_STATIC) != null
                && modifiersAST.findFirstToken(TokenTypes.FINAL) != null
            || ScopeUtil.isInAnnotationBlock(ast)
            || ScopeUtil.isInInterfaceBlock(ast);

to make it more visual priority of calculation
timeline.author: romani

timeline.bodyText:
?
Am I miss somethig ?
https://checkstyle.sourceforge.io/config_naming.html#ConstantName
it is about fields only.
timeline.author: romani
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,24 @@
+//non-compiled with javac: Compilable with Java9
+package com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.checks.naming.methodname;
+
+/*
+ * Config:
+ * applyToPrivate = false
+ */
+public interface InputMethodNamePrivateMethodsInInterfaces {
+
+    private void PrivateMethod() {} // ok
+
+    private static void PrivateMethod2() {} // ok
+
+    default void DefaultMethod() { // violation

replies.bodyText: MethodNameCheck giving false-positives as well on same thing, since they have common way to detect visibility. I fixed both checks.
replies.author: strkkk

replies.bodyText: Ok, my bad. Issue case focused me on one Check
replies.author: romani

timeline.message: Issue #8569: fix ConstantNameCheck and MethodNameCheck for interfaces

timeline.bodyText: +2 in indentation, as it is not on same level of execution as ||
timeline.author: romani
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -95,6 +96,22 @@ protected boolean shouldCheckInScope(DetailAST modifiers) {
                 || applyToPrivate && isPrivate;
     }
 
+    /**
+     * Checks if given modifiers has public access.
+     * There are 2 cases - it is either has explicit modifier, or it is
+     * in annotation or interface.
+     *
+     * @param modifiers - modifiers to check
+     * @return true if public
+     */
+    private static boolean isPublic(DetailAST modifiers) {
+        return modifiers.findFirstToken(TokenTypes.LITERAL_PUBLIC) != null
+                || ScopeUtil.isInAnnotationBlock(modifiers)
+                || ScopeUtil.isInInterfaceBlock(modifiers)
+                // interface methods can be private
+                && modifiers.findFirstToken(TokenTypes.LITERAL_PRIVATE) == null;
